feed.title: Mei Jiaming’s Blog
feed.subtitle: This is Jiaming's personal website, I'll share some interesting things or techniques here.

entry.title: Student congress
entry.content:
It’s my honor to be supported by more than 200 students and become an student representative.

To be honest, I was disappointed by the series of formalism at the beginning of the Congress. This disappointment accumulated to a climax before the bureau election. I finally decided to interrupt the election and proposed to increase the candidate Q&A session.

For student Han’s loss, I felt very sorry. I have to admit that student Han is a very good speaker, but his content is too void. However, what ShanghaiTech really needs are doers, not speakers.

One more thing, On the way to the conference room, I met an excellent classmate, Who opened a series of courses on Bilibili.com. I wish this guy would got a position with an annual salary of 500,000 while still have time enjoy life.
entry.summary: It’s my honor to be supported by more than 200 students and become an student representative.

entry.title: Stay skeptical
entry.content:
I have been working on a project related to physics informed neural network in recent months. The content is about solving partial differential equations through neural networks. The difference from traditional neural networks is that we don’t need to use any label data, just use equations to construct Loss function.

while constructing the loss function, I need to use a complex equation, the coefficients of the equation need to be solved by using KL expansion. Big brother Tang has done research on KL development before. I directly adopted the theoretical analysis of the Tang.

According to the formula provided by the big brother, I quickly implement it using python, but the coefficients obtained were deviated from expectations. Since there have been mistakes caused by incorrect understanding of the formula before, I suspect that there is a problem with my understanding. After communicating with the big brother several times, I firmly believe that there is no problem with my understanding. Then I suspected that there was a problem with the code details. However, after dozens of audits, I still couldn’t solve the problem. Asking for help from the mentor, still unable to solve the problem. After tossing for more than a week, I communicated with the big brother again, and finally found that the formula provided by the big brother was wrong.

Why I have never suspected that the formula is wrong? Perhaps it is because the code of the big brother has been written into the project in the group, and it has been used and tested by many team members. However, the formula provided by Tang comes from his comments, and his code does not directly use comments. Anyway, problem is solved, and the loss converged.
entry.summary: I have been working on a project related to physics informed neural network in recent months. The content is about solving partial differential equations through neural networks. The difference from traditional neural networks is that we don’t need to use any label data, just use equations to construct Loss function.

entry.title: Vscode path
entry.content: When I am trying to write a scrip for JD.com flash buy, I find a interesting thing. my vscode root directory is ‘/JDpython’, while my main function is in the secondary directory ‘/JDpython/JDassist’. when run ‘print os.getcwd()’, the result shows ‘/JDpython’ not /JDpython/JDassist.
entry.summary: When I am trying to write a scrip for JD.com flash buy, I find a interesting thing. my vscode root directory is ‘/JDpython’, while my main function is in the secondary directory ‘/JDpython/JDassist’. when run ‘print os.getcwd()’, the result shows ‘/JDpython’ not /JDpython/JDassist.

entry.title: Recommendation: Some fresh milk
entry.content: I bought several different fresh milk on JD.com and local supermarket. ‘光明 优倍 950ml 浓醇鲜奶鲜牛奶’ wins. It’s Milky flavor is stronger and not that expensive.
entry.summary: I bought several different fresh milk on JD.com and local supermarket. ‘光明 优倍 950ml 浓醇鲜奶鲜牛奶’ wins. It’s Milky flavor is stronger and not that expensive.

entry.title: Displaying an index of posts
entry.content:
Displaying an index of posts Creating an index of posts on another page should be easy thanks to Liquid and its tags. Here’s a simple example of how to create a list of links to your blog posts:


  
  

  
  

  
  <h3>update</h3>
  
  
    <ul><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-11-23 00:00:00 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/11/23/student-congress.html">
            Student congress
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-10-18 00:00:00 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/10/18/Dare-to-challenge-authority.html">
            Stay skeptical
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-09-14 00:00:00 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/09/14/best-TA.html">
            Best TA
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-09-14 00:00:00 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/09/14/outstanding-student.html">
            Outstanding Student
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-08-04 00:00:00 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/08/04/path-way.html">
            Vscode path
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-08-03 10:58:01 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/08/03/ali.html">
            KDD Cup 2020 Challenges for Modern E-Commerce Platform:Debiasing
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-08-03 10:58:01 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/08/03/milk-Evaluation.html">
            Recommendation: Some fresh milk
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-08-01 00:00:00 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/08/01/Display-posts.html">
            Displaying an index of posts
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-07-20 10:58:01 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/07/20/Milk.html">
            Recommendation: Some overseas milk brands
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-07-18 00:00:00 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/07/18/gardenParty.html">
            Garden Party
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-07-17 10:58:01 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/07/17/myCode.html">
            Mass Mail Sending script
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-07-15 10:58:01 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/07/15/Server-migration.html">
            Server migration resulting data loss!
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-07-15 00:00:00 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/07/15/Affliate-to-STU.html">
            School Affiliated to STU!
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-07-11 10:58:01 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/07/11/select_low-priced_stocks.html">
            Automatically select low-priced stocks
          </a>
        </h3></li><li>
        <span class="post-meta">2020-07-09 00:53:07 +0800</span>
        <h3>
          <a class="post-link" href="/update/2020/07/09/welcome-to-jekyll.html">
            Welcome to Jekyll!
          </a>
        </h3></li></ul>

You have full control over how (and where) you display your posts, and how you structure your site. You should read more about how templates work with Jekyll if you want to know more. CategoriesPermalink Categories of a post work similar to the tags above:

They can be defined via the front matter using keys category or categories (that follow the same logic as for tags) All categories registered in the site are exposed to Liquid templates via site.categories which can be iterated over (similar to the loop for tags above.)
entry.summary: Displaying an index of posts Creating an index of posts on another page should be easy thanks to Liquid and its tags. Here’s a simple example of how to create a list of links to your blog posts:
